content.rendered: Tingkatkan sistem keamanan bangunan dengan memasang Samsung CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-7010RP. Kamera CCTV adalah solusi keamanan untuk memberikan pengawasan jarak jauh meskipun anda sedang tidak berada di tempat. Kamera Samsung CCTV Camera Samsung QNV-7010RP mempunyai spesifikasi, diantaranya: Max. 4M resolution Built-in 2.8mm fixed lens (QNV-7010R) Max. 20fps@4M resolutions, Max. 30fps@2M resolutions H.265, H.264, MJPEG codec supported, Multiple streaming Motion detection, Tampering, Defocus detection micro SD (128GB) memory slot, PoE / 12V DC IR viewable length 20m (QNV-7010R), 25m (QNV-7020R) 30m (QNV-7030R) Hallway view, WiseStream support, IP66, IK10 LDC support (Lens Distortion Correction)

excerpt.rendered: Max. 4M resolution Built-in 2.8mm fixed lens (QNV-7010R) Max. 20fps@4M resolutions, Max. 30fps@2M resolutions H.265, H.264, MJPEG codec supported, Multiple streaming Motion detection, Tampering, Defocus detection micro SD (128GB) memory slot, PoE / 12V DC IR viewable length 20m (QNV-7010R), 25m (QNV-7020R) 30m (QNV-7030R) Hallway view, WiseStream support, IP66, IK10 LDC support (Lens Distortion Correction)
